Title: SharePad Reference Application for SharePoint Products and Technologies
Description: SharePad is a reference application demonstrating Microsoft Office-style SharePoint integration techniques. This application illustrates the use of the Front Page RPC calls exposed by SharePoint among other SharePoint integration APIs.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SharePad is a reference application demonstrating Microsoft Office-style SharePoint integration techniques. This application illustrates the use of the Front Page RPC calls exposed by SharePoint among other SharePoint integration APIs.



Note: This was a direct port from the SharePad GotDotNet workspace http://www.gotdotnet.com/workspaces/sharepad and source code was not changed as part of the migration.
